How can you spot a rumor? When evaluating information you find on social media or other outlets, it is important to follow these guidelines:
Use trusted sources, such as official government or health care websites and social media channels. Evaluate other information from the source, including links and sources, to see if it appears reliable. Search other credible resources to see if they are sharing similar information. Learn more about coronavirus myths Coronavirus Disease 2019: Myth vs. Fact
